snippet.title: TLATOANI - Demo Announcement | Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Try an early version of Tlatoani - Tlatoani: Prologue now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2925280/Tlatoani_Prologue/

Wishlist at 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3161270/Tlatoani_Aztec_Cities/

And play a new Demo at Steam Next Fest, on October 14th!

Discover the wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder adorned with beautiful hand drawn 2D graphics. From humble beginnings rise to build, trade and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#ParadoxInteractive #Paradox
